Player History
Injured on 5/15/1967 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Drafted in 6th round, 114th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1972...

Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Chicago (N) on 5/3/1978...

Injured on 4/4/1991 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/6/1992 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Released by Pittsburgh on 6/16/1993...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 3/1/1994 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/2/1994 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 7/20/1994...
Released by Texas on 10/8/1996...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/2/1997 to a 2-year deal worth $850,000 per year...
